author: Bob Developer
message: fix: resolve null pointer exception in login flow
diff:
diff --git a/src/auth.py b/src/auth.py
index abc123..def456 100644
--- a/src/auth.py
+++ b/src/auth.py
@@ -5,2 +5,4 @@
-    return user
+    if user is None:
+        raise ValueError('User not found')
+    return user
